title: Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival
description:
Welcome to Omiko City, where everyone’s favorite Taiko elements come together in one place! Together with Don-chan, meet your new friend, Kumo-kyun and aim to become a Taiko Master
Great Drum Toy War Play along to songs and deploy toys to push back your opponent’s toys and aim for victory Don-chan Band Work as a group of 4 to perform successful concerts Run! Ninja Dojo Become a ninja and race with up to 4 other players! Overcome multiple obstacles as you compete for 1st place

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz / AMD A12-9800, 3.80 GHz
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti, 2 GB / AMD Radeon HD 7770, 2 GB / Intel Iris Plus
